duration_in_months: Our time frame of delivery is six (6) months from Contract award.
full_summary:
**emphasis on clarity and concision**
===============

**Renovation of a Residential Building for the Embassy of Canada to the Philippines**
-------------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01029077
*   **Solicitation Number:** 23-232009
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** March 6, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 14, 2023, 2:00 PM
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None specified

**Summary:**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires a contractor to renovate the kitchen of the Official Residence (OR) in Makati City, Manila, Philippines. The work involves the replacement of flooring, cabinetry, countertops, appliances, electrical, plumbing, and fixtures, as per the provided plans.

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Foreign
*   **Contracting Entity:** Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)

**Contact Information:**

*   Name: Tanya DiVirgilio
*   Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 343-573-0472
*   Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0G2

**Attachments:**

*   The RFP document (23-232009_RFP_EN.pdf)
*   Addendum 1 (2023-03-22_ADDENDA_001.pdf)
*   Addendum 2 (2023-03-31_ADDENDUM_002.pdf)
*   Addendum 3 (2023-04-04_ADDENDUM_003.pdf)
*   Quotation and Request for Information (Q and RFQ documents) can be found in the following links: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/31/bb092dfd25ca1f6ce9cb3324ead14baf/q_et_r_1.pdf https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023
